trans-unit.id: On EE, MMM d, yyyy at %@, %@, wrote:
trans-unit.source: On EE, MMM d, yyyy at %1$@, %2$@, wrote:
trans-unit.target: El EE, MMM d, yyyy a les %1$@, %2$@, va escriure:
trans-unit.note: reply email content header, EE,MMM d, yyyy change to your country local format. if you are not sure just keep it as it. first %@ is 12/24 hour format, second %@ will be the email hyper link, they will be loaded in code.

trans-unit.id: Our Customer Support team will try to activate your service plan manually if you agree to attach technical data that AppStore provided to the app at the moment of purchase. This data does not include any details about your iTunes account, Apple ID, linked credit cards, or any other user information. Technical data only helps us check and verify that the transaction was fulfilled on the AppStore's servers.
trans-unit.source: Our Customer Support team will try to activate your service plan manually if you agree to attach technical data that AppStore provided to the app at the moment of purchase. This data does not include any details about your iTunes account, Apple ID, linked credit cards, or any other user information. Technical data only helps us check and verify that the transaction was fulfilled on the AppStore's servers.
trans-unit.target: El nostre equip intentarà activar el vostre abonament manualment si està d'acord en adjuntar les dades tècniques que l'AppStore ens proporcionà en el moment de la compra. Aquestes dades no inclouen detalls del seu compte d'iTunes, d'Apple ID, de tarjetes de crèdit o cap altra informació personal. Solament servirà per verificar que la transacció s'ha realitzat en els servidors d'AppStore.

trans-unit.target: Introduïu un número de telèfon mòbil vàlid.

trans-unit.id: Please input a valid email address.
trans-unit.source: Please input a valid email address.
trans-unit.target: Please input a valid email address.

trans-unit.id: Please log in to the ProtonMail account you're upgrading the service plan for so we can complete the purchase.
trans-unit.source: Please log in to the ProtonMail account you're upgrading the service plan for so we can complete the purchase.
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, accediu al compte de ProtonMail que voleu actualitzar per poder completar la compra.

trans-unit.id: Please log in to the ProtonMail account you're upgrading the service plan for so we can complete the service plan activation.
trans-unit.source: Please log in to the ProtonMail account you're upgrading the service plan for so we can complete the service plan activation.
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, accediu al compte de ProtonMail que voleu actualitzar per poder completar la compra.

trans-unit.id: Please pick a user name first!

trans-unit.target: Si us plau, indica un nom per al grup
trans-unit.note: The message will show up when the user attempts to create a contact group without any name specified

trans-unit.id: Please remove all attachments before changing sender!
trans-unit.source: Please remove all attachments before changing the sender
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, elimineu tots els fitxers adjunts abans de canviar el remitent
trans-unit.note: when switch sender but email has attachments

trans-unit.id: Please select at least one email for the contact group
trans-unit.source: Please select at least one email for the contact group
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, seleccioneu almenys un e-mail per al grup de contacte
trans-unit.note: The message will show up when the user attempts to create a contact group without any email selected

trans-unit.id: Please select one of the following options:
trans-unit.source: Please select one of the following options:
trans-unit.target: Seleccioneu una de les opcions següents:
Si us plau establiu una contrasenya.
Si us plau, proveu un domini diferent.

trans-unit.id: Please try a different email address.
trans-unit.source: Please try a different email address.
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, proveu una altra adreça electrònica.
Si us plau, proveu una contrasenya diferent.

trans-unit.id: Please try a different user name.
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, proveu un nom d’usuari diferent.
Torneu-ho a provar, si us plau

trans-unit.id: Please unlock the app to proceed with your service plan activation
trans-unit.source: Please unlock the app to proceed with your service plan activation
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, obriu l'app per continuar amb l’activació de l’abonament

trans-unit.id: Please use ProtonMail App login first.
trans-unit.source: Please use ProtonMail App login first.
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, utilitzeu primer l'inici de sessió en l’App ProtonMail.

trans-unit.id: Please use the web application to reset your password.
trans-unit.source: Please use the web application to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Utilitzeu l'aplicació web per restablir la vostra contrasenya.

trans-unit.id: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your mailbox password!
trans-unit.source: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your mailbox password!
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, utilitzeu la versió web de ProtonMail per canviar la contrasenya de bústia!

trans-unit.id: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your passwords!
trans-unit.source: Please use the web version of ProtonMail to change your passwords!
trans-unit.target: Utilitzeu la versió web de ProtonMail per canviar les contrasenyes!

trans-unit.id: Please use your new password when signing in.
trans-unit.source: Please use your new password when signing in.
trans-unit.target: Utilitzeu la vostra nova contrasenya en iniciar la sessió.

trans-unit.id: Please wait until the email downloaded!
trans-unit.source: Please wait until the email downloaded!
trans-unit.target: Espereu fins que baixeu el correu electrònic!

trans-unit.id: Please, manage it in your phone.
trans-unit.source: Please, manage it in your phone.
trans-unit.target: Si us plau, féu-ho en el telèfon.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail Plus is required to customize your mobile signature
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail Plus is required to customize your mobile signature
trans-unit.target: Es requereix ProtonMail Plus per personalitzar la vostra signatura mòbil

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to add and edit contact details beyond just your contact’s name and email. By using ProtonMail, this data will be as secure as your end-to-end encrypted email.
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to add and edit contact details beyond just your contact’s name and email. By using ProtonMail, this data will be as secure as your end-to-end encrypted email.
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionario li permet afegir i editar detalls de contacte més enllà del nom i correu electrònic del vostre contacte. Mitjançant l'ús de ProtonMail, aquestes dades seran tan segures com el vostre correu electrònic xifrat extrem a extrem.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail doesn't sell ads or abuse your privacy. Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. You can upgrade to a paid account or donate to support ProtonMail.
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail doesn't sell ads or abuse your privacy. Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. You can upgrade to a paid account or donate to support ProtonMail.
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail no ven anuncis ni abusos de la vostra privadesa. El vostre suport és essencial per mantenir funcionant ProtonMail. Podeu actualitzar a un compte de pagament o donar per donar suport a ProtonMail.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail is currently offline, check our twitter for the current status: https://twitter.com/protonmail
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail is currently offline, check our twitter for the current status: https://twitter.com/protonmail
trans-unit.target: Actualment ProtonMail es troba fora de línia, consulta'n l'estat actual al nostre twitter: https://twitter.com/protonmail
RESTABLIR LA CONTRASENYA DE LA BÚSTIA DE CORREU

trans-unit.id: Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
trans-unit.source: Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
trans-unit.target: En informar d’un missatge com a intent de suplantació d’identitat aquest se’ns serà enviat, per poder analitzar-lo i millorar-ne els filtres. Això significa que podrem veure el contingut del missatge sencer.
S'està restablint la memòria cau del missatge ...

trans-unit.id: Thank you for submitting a bug report. We have added your report to our bug tracking system.
trans-unit.source: Thank you for submitting a bug report. We have added your report to our bug tracking system.
trans-unit.target: Gràcies per enviar un informe d'error. Hem afegit el vostre informe al nostre sistema de seguiment d'errors.

trans-unit.id: This can take a while. Please do not dismiss the app.
trans-unit.source: This can take a while. Please do not dismiss the app.
trans-unit.target: Pot trigar una estona. Si us plau, no tanqueu l'app.

trans-unit.id: This contact belongs to your Address Book.
trans-unit.source: This contact belongs to your address book.
trans-unit.target: Aquest contacte pertany a la vostra llibreta d'adreces.

trans-unit.id: This email has failed its domain's authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.source: This email has failed its domain's authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.target: Aquest correu no ha superat els requisits d'autentificació del domini. Pot ser que estigui falsejat o reenviat indegudament!

trans-unit.id: This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.source: This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.target: Aquest correu sembla que sigui d'una adreça de ProtonMail però ha arribat des de fora del nostre sistema i no ha passat els requisits d'autentificació. És possible que es tracti d'un correu falsejat o reenviat indegudament!

trans-unit.id: This message may be a phishing attempt. Please check the sender and contents to make sure they are legitimate.
trans-unit.source: This message may be a phishing attempt. Please check the sender and contents to make sure they are legitimate.
trans-unit.target: Aquest missatge pot ser un intent de suplantació d’identitat. Comproveu el remitent i els continguts per assegurar-vos que són legítims.

trans-unit.id: To prevent abuse of ProtonMail, we need to verify that you are human.
trans-unit.source: To prevent abuse of ProtonMail, we need to verify that you are human.
trans-unit.target: Per evitar l'ús abusiu de ProtonMail, necessitem verificar que sou humà.

trans-unit.target: Per restablir la contrasenya de la vostra bústia, si us plau, feu servir la versió de ProtonMail a proton.me

trans-unit.source: Warning: You did not set a recovery email so account recovery is impossible if you forget your password. Proceed without recovery email?

trans-unit.source: We have successfully activated your subscription. Please relaunch the app to start using your new service plan.

trans-unit.id: You can get help and support at proton.me/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.
trans-unit.source: You can get help and support at proton.me/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.

trans-unit.id: You can't set %@ address as default because it is a paid feature.
trans-unit.source: You can't set %@ address as default because it is a paid feature.
trans-unit.target: No podeu configurar %@ adreça com a predeterminada perquè és una funció de pagament.

trans-unit.id: You enabled message expiration, but not all recipients support this. Please add a password and/or disable PGP sending to use expiration for all recipients.
trans-unit.source: You enabled message expiration, but not all recipients support this. Please add a password and/or disable PGP sending to use expiration for all recipients.
trans-unit.target: Heu activat la data de caducitat del missatge, però no tots els destinataris ho admeten. Afegiu una contrasenya i/o desactiveu l'enviament PGP per utilitzar la caducitat per a tots els destinataris.

trans-unit.id: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save it?
trans-unit.source: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save it?
trans-unit.target: Hi ha canvis no desats. Vols desar-los?

trans-unit.source: You have used %1$d%% of your storage space (%2$@).
trans-unit.target: Heu utilitzat %1$d%% del vostre espai d'emmagatzematge (%2$@).

trans-unit.source: You have used up all of your storage space (%@).
trans-unit.target: Has utilitzat tot el teu espai d'emmagatzematge (%@).

trans-unit.source: You need at least one recipient to send
trans-unit.target: Necessites almenys un destinatari per enviar

trans-unit.id: Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically securely email friends, have them get ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don't use ProtonMail.
trans-unit.source: Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically securely email friends, have them get ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don't use ProtonMail.
trans-unit.target: La safata d'entrada està protegida amb el xifrat extrem a extrem. Per enviar missatges de correu electrònic de manera automàtica, envieu-los a ProtonMail. També podeu xifrar manualment missatges si no utilitza ProtonMail.

trans-unit.id: Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.
trans-unit.source: Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.

trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.target: No s'ha pogut omplir la pàgina web perquè no s'ha pogut avaluar l'script

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.target: No s'ha pogut omplir la pàgina web perquè falta un script

trans-unit.id: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the Password Extension
trans-unit.target: No s'ha pogut obtenir la cadena d'URL des de la visualització web. La vista web s'ha de carregar completament quan truqueu a l'Extensió de contrasenya

trans-unit.id: Failed to parse information returned by Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to parse information returned by Password Extension
trans-unit.target: No s'ha pogut analitzar la informació retornada per l'extensió de la contrasenya

trans-unit.id: Password Extension was cancelled by the user
trans-unit.source: Password Extension was cancelled by the user
trans-unit.target: L'usuari ha cancel·lat l'extensió de la contrasenya
